title: Multimedia Learning Material Design for Digital-Based Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Understanding of Pharmacological Concepts
context.additional_context: Designing for cognitive load minimization and enhanced learning effectiveness in smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain slide design principles based on cognitivist multimedia learning theory.
Learners can generate digital materials linking visual elements to drug mechanism explanations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can classify and evaluate the cognitive/motivational effects of multimedia elements presented in mobile environments into three or more levels.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
